result.title: XOdia : Battle of the Bots
result.content:
Hello Codeforces!

Credenz '17, the annual techfest of Pune Institute of Computer Technology proudly presents XOdia!
An online platform where you write code that competes and plays our game.

You are allowed to code in C, C++ or Python. All the participants' codes will be made to compete against each other.
An international cash prize of INR 5000 is up for grabs!

Presenting this year's game, Cryptron!
Visit our website: www.xodia.in

The website is now open for submissions. Registrations are free.
Last date of submission: 8th Oct, 2017.

For further details contact:
Sayali Deshpande: 9049541066
Faraz Saifullah: 9145382864
